item.title: LCGen: Mining in Low-Certainty Generation for View-consistent Text-to-3D
item.description: LCGen: A novel method for view-consistent text-to-3D generation, resolving the ‘Janus Problem’ by strategically using low-certainty priors to align viewpoints and optimize the generation process.
